reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 368/07: REGISTRATION REQUIREMENTS FOR BUSINESS ENTITIES
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 368/07: REGISTRATION REQUIREMENTS FOR BUSINESS ENTITIES
reg_info.act_under: Private Security and Investigative Services Act, 2005

content.content: 1. Every business entity that is required to register as an employer under clause 5 (a) of the Act shall, upon registration, provide the Registrar with, (a)  a list of all its employees who are private investigators or security guards; and (b)  the name, address and telephone number of a representative of the business entity.  O. Reg. 368/07, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. Every business entity that is required to register as an employer under clause 5 (a) of the Act shall, upon registration, provide the Registrar with,

(a)  a list of all its employees who are private investigators or security guards; and

(b)  the name, address and telephone number of a representative of the business entity.  O. Reg. 368/07, s. 1.

content.content: 2. (1) Every registration that is issued on or after July 1, 2021 expires three years after the date of registration. O. Reg. 236/21, s. 1. (2) Every registration that was issued before July 1, 2021 expires one year after the date of registration. O. Reg. 236/21, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
2. (1) Every registration that is issued on or after July 1, 2021 expires three years after the date of registration. O. Reg. 236/21, s. 1.

(2) Every registration that was issued before July 1, 2021 expires one year after the date of registration. O. Reg. 236/21, s. 1.

content.content: 3. Every business entity that is required to register as an employer under clause 5 (a) of the Act shall renew its registration before it would expire and provide the Registrar with, (a)  an updated list of all employees who are private investigators or security guards; and (b)  the name, address and telephone number of a representative of the business entity, if different from the information previously given. O. Reg. 236/21, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
3. Every business entity that is required to register as an employer under clause 5 (a) of the Act shall renew its registration before it would expire and provide the Registrar with,

(a)  an updated list of all employees who are private investigators or security guards; and

(b)  the name, address and telephone number of a representative of the business entity, if different from the information previously given. O. Reg. 236/21, s. 1.

content.content: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 368/07, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 368/07, s. 5.
